job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Automation Engineer / Original Machine Learning Engineer<br><br></strong></p><p><strong>Fort Collins, Colorado, USA, 80528<br><br></strong></p><p><strong>Location: </strong><strong>Fort Collins, CO<br><br></strong></p><p><strong>Duration: 6 Months<br><br></strong></p><p> <br><br></p><p><strong>Required Skills<br><br></strong></p><ul><br><li><strong>7+ years of professional work experience optimizing DL/ML models for commercial deployment</strong></li><li><strong>7+ years of bench-marking, testing, and debugging models for most efficient performance on x86 CPU and Nvidia GPU architectures</strong></li><li>Hands-on experience using scripting languages such as Python, C/C++</li><li>Familiarity with hardware architectures beyond CPU and GPU (e.g., TPU, VPU, FPGA, etc.)</li><li>Experience with most popular Deep Learning frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow, etc.) and Machine Learning Techniques</li><li>Proven track record of successful implementation and deployment of DL/ML models at scale</li><li>Familiarity with general test automation for complex systems in public/private cloud</li></ul><br><br>TPU, VPU, FPGA,PyTorch, TensorFlow,GPU architectures, Python, C/C++,DL/ML models,x86 CPU
